title: Ep 213 | Phil & the Unmanned Tractor, Odd Preacher Fashion Trends & Guarding Against Affairs
description:
Phil doesn't know much about PayPal, but he's pretty sure "he ain't my pal." Jase spots a remarkable fashion trend among preachers. When a leak starts to flood the Unashamed Lair, Phil fixes it in true redneck style. He also witnesses a field planted for him in a way he's never seen. And the guys discuss church leaders and sexual immorality, guarding yourself against extramarital affairs, and how it can harm the message of Christ when Christian leaders embrace sin.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
